LanguageData.InstallAntigrainDMS.label: install antigrain dead mans switch
LanguageData.InstallAntigrainDMS.description: Installs a antigrain implant that explodes upon the pawns death.
LanguageData.InstallEMPDMS.label: install EMP dead mans switch
LanguageData.InstallEMPDMS.description: Installs an EMP that explodes upon the pawns death.
LanguageData.InstallFirefoamDMS.label: install Firefoam dead mans switch
LanguageData.InstallFirefoamDMS.description: Installs a Firefoam bomb that explodes upon the pawns death. Human Firefoam poppers.
LanguageData.InstallHighExplosiveDMS.label: install high explosive dead mans switch
LanguageData.InstallHighExplosiveDMS.description: Installs a high explosive implant that explodes upon the pawns death.
LanguageData.InstallIncendiaryDMS.label: install incendiary dead mans switch
LanguageData.InstallIncendiaryDMS.description: Installs an incendiary implant that explodes upon the pawns death.
